news.title: Applebee's and IHOP Embrace AI to Revolutionize Dining Experience
news.body: Applebee's and IHOP, under Dine Brands, are rolling out AI technology across 3,500 locations to enhance customer service and optimize operations. This strategic move aims to personalize interactions and streamline processes, setting a new standard in the restaurant industry's adoption of technology to meet consumer demands.

news.title: X Ventures into Financial Services with Trading and Payment Cards
news.body: X, previously known as Twitter, is expanding its horizon by entering the financial services sector with plans to offer trading services and possibly its own branded payment cards. This pivot could transform X into a key player in financial technology, integrating social media with personal finance.

news.title: UK Government Expands Open Banking to Boost Economy by £28 Billion
news.body: The UK's Smart Data Group is set to extend open banking principles to other sectors, potentially unlocking an economic value of £28 billion. This initiative will promote broader data sharing and innovation, significantly impacting the financial services landscape.

news.title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payment Service for Global Merchants
news.body: Coinbase has introduced a new stablecoin payment service, allowing merchants worldwide to accept payments in USDC. This development aims to streamline e-commerce transactions and broaden the adoption of digital currencies, marking a significant advancement in fintech.

news.title: Visa Advocates for Financial Institutions to Develop Stablecoin Strategies
news.body: Visa is enhancing its blockchain settlement capabilities in the CEMEA region, stressing the necessity for financial institutions to adopt stablecoin strategies. This move underscores the escalating role of digital currencies in global finance and Visa's commitment to leading this transformation.

curiosity.text: Did you know that the UK's initiative to expand open banking could unlock an economic value of £28 billion? This expansion not only fosters innovation but also enhances data sharing across multiple industries.
